Reviews.Title: Fuji Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeffryer
Reviews.Content: This is a great little camera for taking family pics, wild life, etc.  We are not avid photographers but needed something that could fit in a pocket, purse, etc.  Select the appropriate lens setting, i.e., out door scene, indoor, night, etc and you'll get the best focus and color settings.  For us,  this has all what we need in a camera as well as the price.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Hall "2528"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a gift for my daughter and she loves it.  Especially the color.  FUJI is a quality product.

Reviews.Title: Booooo!
Reviews.Author: Marty Parker
Reviews.Content: This thing is a hunk of junk. Here are three reasons why:1) Within the first year the zoom lever broke.2) The lens sometimes sticks in the "macro" position.3) Worst of all, when I turn the camera off and then go to use it the next day, the battery is completely drained.This piece of excrement is flawed beyond redemption. When I get a new camera I'm going to chuck the Fuji as far as I can throw it, and watch with glee when it smashes to the ground. Hate, hate, hate this camera.Signed,Hater

ProductInfo.Features:
3.0-inch TFT color LCD monitor
16 million effective pixels 1/2.3-inch CCD image sensor with primary color filter
Fujinon 5x optical zoom lens with approx. 7.2x digital zoom
Focal Length: f/4.6mm-23mm; Full Aperture: f/3.5 (Wide), f/6.3 / f/15 (Telephoto)
HD movie (1280 x 720p/30fps)
ProductInfo.Name: Fujifilm FinePix JX680 16 MP Digital Camera with 3-Inch LCD (Red)
